name: Pilot
quote: Aw, come on, Frank. We've all had 12 straight hours of meatball surgery in there.

name: Dear Dad
quote: At last, after almost three straight days of meatball surgery.

name: Dear Dad, Again
quote: But doing meatball surgery -- you either develop a thick skin or you wind up in the Tokyo Giggling Academy.

name: Cease-Fire
quote: Trapper, it's over. No more meatball surgery.

name: Fade Out, Fade In, Part I
quote: Up here it's strictly meatball surgery.

name: Fade Out, Fade In, Part II
quote: Neatness don't count in meatball surgery.

name: The Winchester Tapes
quote: This meatball surgery of yours is causing my skills to deteriorate.

name: Our Finest Hour, Part I
quote: This meatball surgery of yours is causing my skills to deteriorate.

name: Life Time
quote: Spoken like a true meatball surgeon.

name: Lend a Hand
quote: Nerve grafts sound damned ambitious for a bunch of meatball surgeons.

name: Operation Friendship
quote: That's why they call us meatball surgeons. Not like a day at the office, eh?

name: Operation Friendship
quote: I'll take this one. I specialize in meatball surgery.
